import React from "react"; export default function Experience() { return (

Internships & Experience

NIT Patna — Summer Intern (Jun 2025 - Jul 2025)

Designed and analyzed internal/external fin structures in PCM using ANSYS for battery thermal management. Achieved ~1.62% reduction in cell temperature by optimizing fins. Worked on meshing and simulation setup.

Certificate

Hitachi Astemo — Summer Trainee (May 2025 - Jun 2025)

Analyzed front and rear shock absorber structures, observed assembly/production lines, applied Lean, Six Sigma and Kaizen methodologies for process improvement.

Certificate

SAE-ZHCET Club — Solid Modeling & Chassis Design (Jun 2023 - Jul 2023)

Led design & modeling in SolidWorks, focusing on structural integrity and manufacturability. Executive member — guided iterative design and prototyping.

Profile

I-STEM Volunteer Ambassador — I-STEM Ambassador Program & Volunteering Initiative

I am truly delighted to announce that I have been selected as an I-STEM Volunteer Ambassador under the I-STEM Ambassador Program and Volunteering Initiative, driven by the prestigious Indian Institute of Science (IISc), Bengaluru 🏛️.

This opportunity empowers me to: ✅ Promote equitable access to R&D infrastructure across India ✅ Lead scientific outreach and community engagement initiatives ✅ Collaborate with leading institutions and innovators ✅ Strengthen India’s scientific ecosystem through impactful volunteering

I’ll soon be participating in the Ambassador Training Program to learn, engage with experts, and align with the vision of I-STEM.

This program enhances my journey as a changemaker in science and innovation while connecting me with a national platform hosted by IISc Bengaluru.

🙏 Heartfelt gratitude to the I-STEM Team and Ms. Sanjana B, Project Analyst (IISc), for trusting me with this opportunity.

Explore I-STEM
); }
